lines.gurmukhi: mwns jnmu Dwir sMgiq suBwv giq gur qy gurmiq durmiq ibibiD ibDwnI hY
lines.transliteration_english: Maanas Janamu Dhaari Sangati Soubhaav Gati , Gur Tay Gurmati Duramati Bibidhi Bidhaanee Hai ?

Shabad OS B.translation: In the human birth, one is influenced by good or bad company. Thus the teachings of Guru instills virtues whereas bad company fills a person with base wisdom.

lines.gurmukhi: swDusMig pdvI Bgiq Aau ibbykI jn jIvn mukiq swDU bHmigAwnI hY
lines.transliteration_english: Saadhousangi Padavee Bhagati Au Bibaykee Jana , Jeevan Moukati Saadhoo Brahamagiaanee Hai ?

Shabad OS B.translation: In the company of true people, one attains a position of a devotee, an analytical person, liberated alive and possessor of divine knowledge.

lines.gurmukhi: ADm AswD sMg cor jwr Aau jUAwrI Tg btvwrw mqvwrw AiBmwnI hY
lines.transliteration_english: Adham Asaadh Sang Chor Jaar Au Jooaaree , Tthag Batavaaraa Matavaaraa Abhimaanee Hai ?

Shabad OS B.translation: Association with evil and vice-ridden people turns a man into thief, gambler, deceitful, dacoit, addict and arrogant.

lines.gurmukhi: Apuny Apuny rMg sMg suKu mwnY ibsu gurmiq giq gurmuiK pihcwnI hY ]165]
lines.transliteration_english: Apounay Apounay Rang Sang Soukhu Maanai Bisu , Gurmati Gati Gurmukhi Pahichaanee Hai ?165?

Shabad OS B.translation: The whole world enjoys peace and pleasures in their own way. But a rare person has understood the intensity of the blessing of Guru's teaching and happiness it gives. (165)
